c-0: ^What’s wrong with a little spontaneity, Mr. Greener? Isn’t surprise the spice of life?
^“A hawk bursting in my room at 3 in the morning isn’t what I would call “a little spontaneity”, Garry.
^You’re too serious, Connor. It’s all in good fun, What’s wrong with an old man celebrating with his close friends?
^And in my old age I’ve come by some regrets. So I wanted to tell you all after our game.
^Why not tell me the secret now? I have other cases I put on hold for this.
^That would ruin the surprise, Mr. Greener! Besides, the detective is the most important character in a mystery.
^And don’t you worry, Mr. Greener. I made sure to make this very interesting. It will be unlike any case you’ve solved before.
c-1: ^Why, they're some of my closest friends and business associates.
^There’s Mr. Raggabound Jr. that I’ve been lobbying for.
^Vivian O’Blique. She’s a magnanimous artist that has showcased in hundreds of galleries.
^Dear Elizaveta Lovanski is leading cutting edge medical trials that could change the world itself.
^Thank you so much, Mr. Faust. I couldn’t have done it without you.
^Damian Allard is my personal clothing designer and creator of NIMBUS. His clothes have a wonderful rustic style to them
^And I can’t forget about Dahlia Lund. She is a fantastic florist and a spectacular saleswoman.
^And lastly, the most important piece on the game board, you. Connor Greener, Private Investigator. Famed cat finder, prover of adultery, and snooper into other people's privacy.
^Hey! I do more important things than that. It’s just there’s been a lull is clients recently.
^I’d love to call you for a case, but you always seem to know the answer before you even walk into the room. That’s not very fun.
^Haha! A damn good detective indeed! I’m very excited to see what you do for our game, Mr. Greener.
c-2: ^Of course. The last thing you want to do is ignore the details. A party would be boring with just people, a table, and drinks. What drives people is the extravagance. The showmanship!
^Sounds to me like an excuse to show off.
^Oh please. What’s wrong with a little self-indulgence from the host?
^Perhaps if you got more consistent work you wouldn’t have to settle in that dingy office of yours.
^I’ll have you know that my clients and I like the “fixer upper” look, and its rent is reasonably affordable.
^Of course. Of Course. Perhaps you need a loan?
^That’s the last thing I need right now.
^Hahaha! Right. Do enjoy the party, Mr. Greener.
